1370: Lambrecht moved to De Tuyt.B.1 after marriage.
Got married to Linnea at age 22 in 1370.
Had a son with Linnea, Radwardo, at age 22.
1371: Had a daughter with Linnea, Marcibilia, at age 23.
1372: Had a daughter with Linnea, Margareta, at age 24.
1373: Had a son with Linnea, Lutgeri, at age 25.
1374: Had a daughter with Linnea, Hersewindis, at age 26.
1376: Had a daughter with Linnea, Liedelde, at age 28.
1381: Had a son with Linnea, Hylonus, at age 33.
1382: Had a son with Linnea, Kerstiaen, at age 34.
1386: Had a son with Linnea, Folpertus, at age 38.
1387: Had a daughter with Linnea, Nellen, at age 39.
Lost son Radwardo when Radwardo was 18 years old.
1389: Lost daughter Liedelde when Liedelde was 14 years old.
1391: Lost daughter Hersewindis when Hersewindis was 17 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
